amendment.description: To provide a highway fuel tax holiday funded by the repeal of certain production incentives, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 3598 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3598.
Amendment SA 3598 proposed by Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S3486-3487) To provide a highway fuel tax holiday funded by the repeal of certain production incentives, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3598 proposed by Senator Menendez.
